mapper.insert: insert into mybatis.fundDate ( TACode, FundCode, DistributorCode, DateType, CorrCfmDate, TransactionCfmDate values ( #{TACode}, #{FundCode}, #{DistributorCode}, #{DateType}, #{CorrCfmDate}, #{TransactionCfmDate} )
mapper.update: update mybatis.fundDate set TACode, = #{TACode}, FundCode, = #{FundCode}, DistributorCode, = #{DistributorCode}, DateType, = #{DateType}, CorrCfmDate, = #{CorrCfmDate}, where TAAccountID = #{TAAccountID}
